questions.question: What is the primary purpose of acclimatization in tissue culture?
choices: To adapt plants to ex vitro conditions
questions.answer: To adapt plants to ex vitro conditions

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical characteristic of in vitro plant growth conditions?
questions.answer: Fluctuating temperatures

questions.question: What is the first step in the acclimatization process?
questions.answer: Removing plants from culture medium

questions.question: Why is it important to clean roots of agar medium during transplanting?
questions.answer: To prevent contamination in soil

questions.question: What is a common composition for potting mix used in transplanting tissue-cultured plants?
questions.answer: Peat, perlite, and vermiculite

questions.question: Why are tissue-cultured plants susceptible to rapid water loss when first transplanted?
choices: They have underdeveloped cuticles and stomata
They require more water than soil-grown plants
questions.answer: They have underdeveloped cuticles and stomata

questions.question: What is the recommended initial relative humidity for newly transplanted tissue-cultured plants?
How should light intensity be managed during the early stages of acclimatization?
choices: Expose plants to full sunlight immediately
Gradually increase light levels over time
questions.answer: Gradually increase light levels over time

questions.question: What is photoinhibition in the context of acclimatization?
choices: Increased photosynthesis due to high light levels
Damage to photosynthetic apparatus due to excessive light
Lack of photosynthesis due to insufficient light
Normal photosynthetic activity in acclimatized plants
questions.answer: Damage to photosynthetic apparatus due to excessive light

questions.question: Why is air circulation important during acclimatization?
choices: To strengthen plant stems and vascular system
questions.answer: To strengthen plant stems and vascular system

questions.question: What is a common method used to maintain high humidity during early acclimatization?
choices: Placing plants under clear plastic domes
questions.answer: Placing plants under clear plastic domes

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common challenge during acclimatization?
questions.answer: Rapid stem elongation

questions.question: What is the primary cause of wilting during acclimatization?
choices: Inability to regulate water loss effectively
questions.answer: Inability to regulate water loss effectively

questions.question: How should temperature be managed during acclimatization?
choices: Expose plants to extreme temperature fluctuations
Keep temperatures as low as possible
questions.answer: Gradually introduce temperature variations

questions.question: What is the typical duration of the acclimatization process?
questions.answer: Several weeks to several months

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of successful acclimatization in commercial agriculture?
choices: Mass production of genetically identical, disease-free plants
questions.answer: Mass production of genetically identical, disease-free plants

questions.question: What role does acclimatization play in conservation efforts?
choices: It increases genetic diversity in plant populations
It allows for the propagation of rare or endangered species
It reduces the need for seed banks
It eliminates the need for habitat preservation
questions.answer: It allows for the propagation of rare or endangered species

questions.question: Why is pest and disease management crucial during acclimatization?
choices: To prevent infections that could compromise plant survival
To reduce the need for fertilizers
questions.answer: To prevent infections that could compromise plant survival

questions.question: What is the recommended method for watering newly transplanted tissue-cultured plants?
choices: Watering at the base of the plant to avoid wetting leaves
Submerging the entire pot in water
questions.answer: Watering at the base of the plant to avoid wetting leaves

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a factor to consider when designing an acclimatization protocol?
questions.answer: Color of the growing container

questions.question: What is the primary reason for gradually reducing humidity during acclimatization?
choices: To stimulate the development of a thicker cuticle
questions.answer: To stimulate the development of a thicker cuticle

questions.question: Which of the following is a sign of successful acclimatization?
questions.answer: New growth and leaf development

questions.question: What is the purpose of using a well-draining potting mix for transplanting?
choices: To reduce the need for watering
To provide better aeration for roots
questions.answer: To provide better aeration for roots

questions.question: Why is it important to monitor plants closely during acclimatization?
choices: To record growth rates for research purposes
To adjust environmental conditions as needed
To determine the best time for fertilization
To decide when to sell the plants
questions.answer: To adjust environmental conditions as needed

questions.question: What is the recommended planting depth for tissue-cultured plants during transplanting?
choices: As deep as possible to protect roots
At the same depth as in the culture vessel
It varies greatly depending on the species
questions.answer: At the same depth as in the culture vessel

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical method for reducing humidity during acclimatization?
choices: Gradually opening vents on humidity domes
Removing plastic covers for increasing periods
Using a dehumidifier in the growing area
Increasing the temperature of the growing environment
questions.answer: Increasing the temperature of the growing environment

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of introducing air circulation during acclimatization?
questions.answer: To strengthen plant structures

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential consequence of failing to properly acclimatize tissue-cultured plants?
questions.answer: High mortality rate upon transplanting

questions.question: What role does stomatal function play in the acclimatization process?
choices: It controls water loss and gas exchange
questions.answer: It controls water loss and gas exchange

questions.question: Why might fungicides be used during the acclimatization process?
choices: To prevent fungal infections in high humidity conditions
questions.answer: To prevent fungal infections in high humidity conditions
